name: Channel Activity Bot
description: Channel Activity Bot for Telegram, Made by @Lawless_Updates.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token, Get this value from @BotFather.

REDIS_URI.description: Redis database URL, Get this Value from redislabs.com

REDIS_PASSWORD.description: Redis database password, Get this Value from redislabs.com.

OWNERS.description: User ID of users who own th bot, Differentiated by space.
